verses.name: Judges 4:1
verses.text: And the children of Israel again did evil in the sight of the Lord, when Ehud was dead.

verses.name: Judges 4:2
verses.text: And the Lord sold them into the hand of Jabin king of Canaan, that reigned in Hazor; the captain of whose host was Sisera, which dwelt in Harosheth of the Gentiles.

verses.name: Judges 4:3
verses.text: And the children of Israel cried unto the Lord: for he had nine hundred chariots of iron; and twenty years he mightily oppressed the children of Israel.

verses.name: Judges 4:4
verses.text: And Deborah, a prophetess, the wife of Lapidoth, she judged Israel at that time.
